a hand-driven grinding mill, made of two stone discs, the below one being stationary on which the other one is rotated.

a class of rāgas, classified as female ones, in Hindūstāni system.

to become red; to be reddened.

to have a warm feel; to have affection; to love.

to wish, desire for.

a kind of kissing, in which the lower lip of the other person is taken into mouth and pressed by the teeth.

of, having, associated with or characterised by structure; structural.
of or in accordance with, structural linguistics; structural.

to hit or strick against with force.
to fall across.

a man of kṣatriya (military) caste.
a master; a lord.
the moon.
